TEXT: A Mortal Kombatant NL Trained by the warriors of the Six Realms.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The one bares their sharp teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you... Wait, its just Skarlet. NL ~"Want some good old blood magic?"~
